tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (ADJP (RB not) (JJ afraid) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NN tomorrow)) (, ,) (SBAR (IN for) (S (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP have) (VP (VBN seen) (NP-TMP (NN yesterday))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP love) (SBAR (S (NP-TMP (NN today)) (VP (VBP #less))))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [afraid/JJ neg>not/RB nmod:of>[tomorrow/NN case>of/IN punct>,/, dep>[seen/VBN mark>for/IN nsubj>I/PRP aux>have/VBP nmod:tmod>yesterday/NN cc>and/CC conj:and>[love/VBP nsubj>I/PRP ccomp>[#less/VBP dep>today/NN]]] dep>love/VBP]]
